properties.description: Visit any of our libraries in Kent for a warm welcome. Browse our shelves, catch up with friends online with our free computer and WiFi access, or meet new people at one of our friendly social groups. Share a story, visit our cheery children's areas with little ones or pop along to one of our regular events. Many other services and partners also use libraries for drop-in surgeries.
properties.title: Broadstairs Library

properties.description: We provide a welcome, warm and comfortable place and free savoury snacks, cakes, teas, coffee and squash. We cater for all. We start at 10am each Thursday with Cafe 4 All, serving pastries, cakes, tea, coffee, squash etc. Mostly people just relax and chat. The Cafe 4 All stops serving at 11.30am but tea, coffee and biscuits are available on a self service basis through till 3pm
properties.title: Cafe 4 All - St Lukeâ€™s Church - Ramsgate
